entry.title: 高一数学公式
entry.content:
高一数学重要公式汇总

一、代数基础

1. 幂的运算性质

  • $a^m \cdot a^n = a^{m+n}$
  • $ rac{a^m}{a^n} = a^{m-n}$, $a eq 0$
  • $(a^m)^n = a^{mn}$
  • $a^{-n} = rac{1}{a^n}$, $a eq 0$
  • $a^0 = 1$, $a eq 0$

2. 因式分解

  • 差平方: $a^2 - b^2 = (a + b)(a - b)$
  • 和平方: $a^2 + 2ab + b^2 = (a + b)^2$
  • 完全立方差: $a^3 - b^3 = (a - b)(a^2 + ab + b^2)$
  • 完全立方和: $a^3 + b^3 = (a + b)(a^2 - ab + b^2)$

3. 二次方程

  • 标准形式: $ax^2 + bx + c = 0$
  • 解的公式: $x = rac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$

二、函数与图像

1. 直线方程

  • 斜率点式: $y - y_1 = m(x - x_1)$
  • 两点式: $y - y_1 = rac{y_2 - y_1}{x_2 - x_1}(x - x_1)$
  • 截距式: $y = mx + b$

2. 圆的标准方程

  • 中心为$O(h, k)$，半径为$r$的圆: $(x - h)^2 + (y - k)^2 = r^2$

三、三角学

1. 基本关系

  • 正弦定理: $ rac{a}{\sin A} = rac{b}{\sin B} = rac{c}{\sin C} = 2R$
  • 余弦定理: $c^2 = a^2 + b^2 - 2ab\cos C$
  • 角度总和: $A + B + C = 180^\circ$

2. 特殊角的三角函数值

  • $\sin 30^\circ = rac{1}{2}, \cos 30^\circ = rac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, an 30^\circ = rac{\sqrt{3}}{3}$
  • $\sin 45^\circ = rac{\sqrt{2}}{2}, \cos 45^\circ = rac{\sqrt{2}}{2}, an 45^\circ = 1$
  • $\sin 60^\circ = rac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, \cos 60^\circ = rac{1}{2}, an 60^\circ = \sqrt{3}$

结语

以上是高一阶段数学学习过程中常用到的一些基本公式。掌握这些公式对于解决相关问题至关重要。希望这份整理能够帮助大家更好地理解和应用数学知识。

entry.title: bilibili推荐
entry.content: 眼哥问你们什么是自由？

entry.title: bilibili推荐
entry.content: “小时候以为是童话，长大后才知是现实”

entry.title: Aplayer-Dplayer-Bilibili-Audio-Video
entry.content:
介绍

在Hexo博客中使用Aplayer、Bilibili播放器以及直接嵌入音频和视频，可以丰富你的文章内容。下面将提供相应的Markdown写法及示例。

Aplayer

安装

首先确保你的Hexo环境已经安装了hexo-tag-aplayer插件。如果还没有，请执行以下命令来安装：

配置

在Hexo根目录下的_config.yml文件中，添加以下配置：

使用

在Markdown文件中，使用如下语法来插入Aplayer播放器：

参数说明
title歌曲名
author歌手名
url歌曲链接
picture_url专辑图片链接
narrow是否使用窄模式
autoplay是否自动播放
width播放器宽度
lrc歌词文件链接

示例：

[00:01.000]Bang bang bang bang...[00:04.550]En en yeah.Woah-oh-oh-oh[00:07.200]It's always a good time[00:09.250]Woah-oh-oh-oh[00:11.670]It's always a good time[00:13.950]Haa o woah oh o oh[00:17.500]Woke up on the right side of the bed[00:21.150]What's up with this Prince song inside my head?[00:25.500]Hands up if you're down to get down tonight[00:30.700]Cuz it's always a good time.[00:32.550]Slept in all my clothes like I didn't care[00:35.800]Hopped into a cab, take me anywhere[00:40.700]I'm in if you're down to get down tonight[00:45.500]Cuz it's always a good time[00:48.650]Good morning and good night[00:52.400]I wake up at twilight[00:55.300]It's gonna be alright[00:58.450]We don't even have to try[01:20.650]It's always a good time[01:02.460]Woah-oh-oh-oh Woah-oh-oh-oh[01:08.350]It's always a good time[01:10.180]Woah-oh-oh-oh[01:14.170]We don't even have to try, it's always a good time.[01:20.160]It's always a good time  Woah-oh-oh-oh[01:26.320]Feet down dropped my phone in the pool again[01:30.040]Checked out of my room hit the ATM[01:33.880]Let's hang out if you're down to get down tonight[01:38.160]Cuz it's always a good time[01:42.180]Good morning and good night[01:45.580]I wake up at twilight[01:49.550]It's gonna be alright we don't even have to try[01:54.750]It's always a good time.[01:56.780]Woah-oh-oh-oh Woah-oh-oh-oh[02:02.280]Woah-oh-oh-oh[02:07.340]We don't even have to try, it's always a good time.[02:11.300]Woah-oh-oh-oh Woah-oh-oh-oh[02:17.680]It's always a good time[02:19.300]Woah-oh-oh-oh[02:22.450]We don't even have to try, it's always a good time.[02:27.270]Doesn't matter when[02:28.030]It's always a good time then[02:30.090]Doesn't matter where[02:32.620]It's always a good time there[02:34.110]Doesn't matter when,[02:36.540]It's always a good time then[02:39.950]It's always a good time[02:42.230]Woah-oh-oh-oh Woah-oh-oh-oh[02:47.640]It's always a good time[02:49.850]Woah-oh-oh-oh[02:53.290]We don't even have to try, it's always a good time[02:57.700]Woah-oh-oh-oh Woah-oh-oh-oh[03:02.630]It's always a good time[03:05.180]Woah-oh-oh-oh[03:08.870]We don't even have to try, it's always a good time[03:12.500]Woah-oh-oh-oh Woah-oh-oh-oh[03:18.130]It's always a good time[03:20.300]Woah-oh-oh-Woah-oh-yeah  Woah-oh-oh-oh[03:25.230]It's always a good time

{% aplayer "Good Time" "Giga" "Good Time.mp3" "https://p2.music.126.net/FZX7XAjsmEPGyVOqm4H7aQ==/109951166361039007.jpg" lrc:"Good Time.lrc" %}

Bilibili (mmedia)

安装

首先确保你的Hexo环境已经安装了hexo-tag-mmedia 插件。如果还没有，请执行以下命令来安装：

配置

在Hexo根目录下的_config.yml文件中，添加以下配置：

使用

在Markdown文件中，使用如下语法来插入Bilibili播放器：

参数默认解释
aid-aid
bvid-bvid，与 aid 同时出现时以 bvid 为准
page1视频分P
danmakutrue是否显示弹幕
allowfullscreenallowfullscreen是否允许全屏播放,改为其他任意值则不允许全屏播放
sandboxallow-top-navigation allow-same-origin allow-forms allow-scripts allow-popups安全沙盒属性
width100%播放器宽度
max_width850px播放器最大宽度
marginauto播放器居中

示例：

{% mmedia "bilibili" "bvid:BV18PUzYWEYk" %}

Aplayer (mmedia)

安装

首先确保你的Hexo环境已经安装了hexo-tag-mmedia 插件。如果还没有，请执行以下命令来安装：

配置

在Hexo根目录下的_config.yml文件中，添加以下配置：

使用

在Markdown文件中，使用如下语法来插入Aplayer播放器：

参数默认解释
name-音频名
artist-音频作者
url-音频链接
cover-音频封面
lrc-音频歌词
theme-音频主题
typeauto音频类型，可选 ‘auto’, ‘hls’, ‘normal’
autoplayfalse是否自动播放
loop‘all’播放器循环播放，可选 ‘all’, ‘one’, ‘none’
order‘list’播放器播放顺序，可选 ‘list’, ‘random’
volume0.7默认音量
tlistMaxHeight-列表最大高度

示例：

{% mmedia "aplayer" "name:Love Story" "url:Love Story.mp3" %}

entry.title: 可以用来学习英语的音乐
entry.content:
学习英语的音乐

介绍

音乐不仅仅是一种放松的方式之一，也是用来学习英语的工具。
这些都是我在网络上收集的一些可以用来学习英语的音乐，希望大家喜欢
大部分都是我们平时在学习英语的时候听到的歌曲，有些是我自己喜欢的歌曲，也有一些是我觉得很好听的歌曲，大家可以根据自己的喜好选择。

歌单

1. God Is a Girl (Chillout Mix)

[00:12.170]3.2.1[00:15.400]Remembering me[00:18.630]Discover and see,[00:22.000]All over the world[00:25.210]She is known as a girl[00:28.620]To those who are free[00:31.770]The mind shall be key[00:34.990]Forgotten as the past[00:38.350]Cause history will last[00:43.580]God is a girl[00:44.980]Wherever you are[00:46.680]Do you believe it[00:48.400]Can you receive it[00:50.100]God is a girl[00:51.610]Whatever you say[00:53.420]Do you believe it[00:55.170]Can you receive it[00:56.930]God is a girl[00:58.290]However you live[01:00.150]Do you believe it[01:01.850]Can you receive it[01:03.560]God is a girl[01:05.170]She's only a girl[01:06.810]Do you believe it[01:08.520]Can you receive it[01:12.000]MUSIC[01:27.390]She wants to shine forever in time[01:30.590]She is so driven[01:32.200]She's always mine[01:34.040]Cleanly and free[01:35.460]She wants you to be a part of the future[01:38.910]A girl like me[01:40.660]There is a sky illuminating us[01:43.890]Someone is out there that we truly trust[01:47.390]There is a rainbow for you and me[01:50.590]A beautiful sunrise eternally[01:55.860]God is a girl[01:57.300]Wherever you are[01:59.050]Do you believe it[02:00.610]Can you receive it[02:02.470]God is a girl[02:04.020]Whatever you say[02:05.670]Do you believe it[02:07.380]Can you receive it[02:09.240]God is a girl[02:10.690]However you live[02:12.450]Do you believe it[02:13.940]Can you receive it[02:16.050]God is a girl[02:17.510]She's only a girl[02:19.050]Do you believe it[02:20.860]Can you receive it[02:24.870]God is a girl[02:26.020]Wherever you are[02:27.670]Do you believe it[02:29.270]Can you receive it[02:31.120]God is a girl[02:32.580]Whatever you say[02:34.400]Do you believe it[02:36.000]Can you receive it[02:37.750]God is a girl[02:39.360]However you live[02:41.020]Do you believe it[02:42.630]Can you receive it[02:44.580]God is a girl[02:46.100]She's only a girl[02:47.750]Do you believe it[02:49.560]Can you receive it[02:52.770]God is a girl~~~~[03:00.000]END

2. Hand in hand(English Version)

[00:00.000]Hand In Hand (手拉手) (English Version) - Koreana (코리아나)[00:06.210]Lyrics by：Bennato Edoardo/Kunze Michael/Moroder Giorgio G/Nannini Gianna/Whitlock Thomas Ross[00:12.420]Composed by：Bennato Edoardo/Kunze Michael/Moroder Giorgio G/Nannini Gianna/Whitlock Thomas Ross[00:18.630]See the fire in the sky[00:26.740]We feel the beating[00:29.210]Of our hearts together[00:36.410]This is our time to rise above[00:44.400]We know the chance is here to live forever for all time[00:57.120]Hand in hand we stand[01:01.380]All across the land[01:05.480]We can make this world[01:07.880]A better place in which to live[01:14.750]Hand in hand we can[01:19.140]Start to understand[01:23.110]Breaking down the walls that come between us for all time[01:32.640]Arirang[01:38.590]Everytime we give it all[01:46.780]We feel the flame eternally inside us[01:56.400]Lift our hands up to the sky[02:04.350]The morning calm helps us to live in harmony for all time[02:16.890]Hand in hand we stand[02:21.280]All across the land[02:25.160]We can make this world[02:27.670]A better place in which to live[02:34.590]Hand in hand we can[02:39.010]Start to understand[02:42.940]Breaking down the walls that come between us for all time[02:52.440]Arirang[03:14.660]Hand in hand we stand[03:19.040]All across the land[03:22.960]We can make this world[03:25.410]A better place in which to live[03:32.360]Hand in hand we can[03:36.730]Start to understand[03:40.670]Breaking down the walls that come between us for all time[03:50.110]Hand in hand[03:51.370]Breaking down the wall between us[03:59.240]Hand in hand[04:00.330]Breaking down the wall

3. My heart will go on

[00:00.000]My Heart Will Go On - 满舒克/MuSik I/廖伟珊[00:00.200]词：夏呈青/满舒克[00:00.300]曲：夏呈青[00:02.560]满：It's real like a dream[00:03.800]My heart will go on[00:05.300]My baby let me know[00:06.420]My heart will go on[00:07.820]Only you know my meaning[00:09.110]My heart will go on[00:10.600]Your mind never go[00:11.880]My heart will go on[00:13.240]It's real like a dream[00:14.410]My heart will go on[00:15.900]My baby let me know[00:17.160]My heart will go on[00:18.490]Only you know my meaning[00:19.900]My heart will go on[00:21.250]Your mind never go[00:22.400]My heart will go on[00:24.540]I'm watching you[00:25.660]You are watching me[00:27.010]我试过多少方式假装已经忘记[00:29.670]My baby[00:30.190]Let it go[00:30.910]我们去过的每个角落像寄托[00:32.990]那我们也笑过[00:34.010]那逝去的生活的[00:35.080]每个片段叫我如何删减[00:37.140]我根本想不到我们最后[00:38.650]只能对生活做到叛变[00:40.270]是因为你才让我 down[00:41.890]因为你才让我 run[00:43.190]因为你才让我变得更加强壮[00:45.560]可为什么现在的你比我还懦弱[00:48.090]当初是因为你的坚强才让我没错过[00:50.860]当我拿到我的第一笔[00:52.090]演出费你说没错[00:53.470]只有站在舞台上的我才最有气魄[00:56.420]I never give up[00:57.460]自从你开始[00:58.240]Far away[00:58.900]我内心变大也让我能够不后退[01:01.660]我找到一个最佳的角色但很受累[01:04.010]但希望你看到我的时候不算是[01:06.090]Too late[01:07.010]我像是一匹迷途的千里马[01:08.730]遇到你像伯乐一样给我力量[01:10.630]让我重新认识自己[01:12.360]就像是当初割破手腕[01:13.800]热血四溅后突然觉得生活充满意义[01:16.130]Never forgot I feel it[01:17.380]It's real like a dream[01:18.440]My heart will go on[01:19.990]My baby let me know[01:21.190]My heart will go on[01:22.570]Only you know my meaning[01:23.950]My heart will go on[01:25.360]Your mind never go[01:26.420]My heart will go you're here in my heart[02:14.200]And my heart will go on and on[02:21.450]夏：Wherever I go[02:22.450]You'll be follow[02:23.650]我早已不习惯了没有你的时候[02:27.140]每当我千疮百孔[02:29.150]你轻柔的停布在每一个裂缝[02:32.340]这感觉 像是好朋友[02:34.970]但感觉 不像爱[02:37.610]你又为何总在我迷茫时出现[02:42.100]只有你[02:43.890]Even my days turning grey[02:46.570]Everybody went away[02:49.080]你让我渐渐学会[02:51.890]飞越[02:52.220]All my darkness day[02:53.920]You know[02:54.540]我们仍在顽抗着[02:56.040]手刃导致中国音乐堕落的 loser[02:59.800]你一直在 together[03:01.500]有你[03:01.770]My heart will go on and on forever[03:04.150]廖：Near far wherever you are[03:13.700]I 这些歌是我自己喜欢的歌曲，里面有很多英文歌词，可以用来学习英语。

entry.title: Welcome to my blog
entry.content:
关于此网站

这是我的个人博客，主要用来记录一些学习笔记、生活感悟、生活收获等。
当你看到这里的时候，说明你已经成功地访问到了我的博客。

1.了解一下

如果你是第一次来到我的博客，那么你可能需要先了解一下

  • 搭建框架
    • Hexo
      • 快速 : 轻量级、高效、易于使用
      • 简洁 : 专注于内容创作
      • 高效 : 静态页面生成，无数据库依赖，快速响应
      • 强大 : 支持各种插件扩展，可定制化程度高
    • 主题
      • butterfly
        • 简洁
        • 美观
        • 功能强大
  • 评论系统
    • Livere
      • 简单
      • 免费
      • 安全
      • 便捷
      • …
    • Waline
      • 功能强大
      • 免费
      • 便捷
      • 网站统计
      • …

2.关于我

  • 虚拟名字：部鑫
  • 爱好：
    • 编程
    • 旅游
    • 音乐
    • 机器学习
    • 物联网
    • 人工智能
    • …
  • 性格：
    • 热爱生活
    • 乐观向上
    • 喜欢交流
    • 不善交流(就是这么矛盾)
    • …

3.关于本站

我将会发布笔记

  • 编程
  • 生活
  • 音乐
  • 学习
  • …
    我也会转载一些优秀的文章，欢迎大家学习交流！

如果你要和我玩游戏，欢迎加入我的QQ群：255918033

最后，欢迎大家多多提意见，共同进步！
